"Princess, I must warn you," she added, low- ering her voice and evidently listening to her- self with pleasure, and speaking with exagger- ated grasseyement? "the prince has been scold- ing Michael Ivanovich. He is in a very bad hu- mor, very morose. Be prepared." 
"Ah, dear friend," replied Princess Mary, "I have asked you never to warn me of the humor my father is in. I do not allow my- self to judge him and would not have others do s
